item.title: Welcome - The Eye Site Opticians - Jersey
item.description:
Welcome - The Eye Site Opticians - Jersey

Your new Optician in Jersey, Bringing you the latest eyewear and the best of lens technologies to suit every lifestyle. From outdoor to intense reader.

item.title: About us - The Eye Site Opticians - Jersey
item.description:
About us - The Eye Site Opticians - Jersey

After years of looking after Jersey's vision for different local opticians, we decided to open The Eye Site Opticians as a way to provide the level of customer service people deserve. Most of our patients come to the Optician because they have to, to them it was a chore and often felt it was an unsatisfactory experience.
